attributes.action: We want the government to prove there is no fraud in all the acts of parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is a public body that works for the public, they have a duty and an obligation to provide crystal clear legislation that contains no fraud.
attributes.background: We want the government to prove there is no fraud in all of the acts that the parliament has enacted, past, present and future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean when you refer to legislation containing "fraud".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
